venue.name: DCR Blessing of the Bay Boathouse

item.description:
The blood-sucking creatures come out in the summertime...

Put on some bug spray and/or garlic, and partake in the SomerMovie Fest picnic/party scene: catch "Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn, Part I" outdoors by the banks of the Mystic River this Thursday night! Movie starts at dusk, which will likely be ~8:45 (sunset's at 8:15). I propose gathering about an hour ahead of time to claim our turf, then nosh and chat till the show starts (bring a beach chair or blanket and whatever refreshments you might desire). Not sure where on the premises to say to meet, but will bring my mobile device to aid on-the-spot coordination.

The Boathouse is just a little over a mile out of Sullivan Square T station. If you loathe walking that far, a 95 bus departing from the T at 7:30 or 8:30 should get you to the movie in time (with or without time to spare for socializing).
item.name: Outdoors Movie Night: Twilight: Breaking Dawn (Part 1)
